Description:
Are you an experienced Laundry Supervisor looking for a new challenge? Look no further than Apt Resources! Our Recruitment company is seeking a Laundry Supervisor for a UHNWF - VVIP.As a Laundry Supervisor, you will manage and coordinate the operations of the laundry department, ensuring that linen and uniforms are cleaned to high standards and delivered back to the hotel in a timely manner. This role requires someone who is highly organized, detail-oriented, and able to lead a team.Manage and supervise the daily operations of the laundry department
Ensure linen and uniforms are cleaned to a high standard and delivered back to the hotel in a timely manner
Train and develop laundry personnel to ensure consistent quality and efficiency
Maintain inventory control of all laundry supplies and equipment
Implement and monitor procedures for safety and cleanliness
Liaise with other departments to ensure smooth linen and uniform logistics
Keep up-to-date with new developments, trends, and methods in laundry operations.Job Details
